Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Southbound Reroute near 111th/Halsted
ShortDescription: Southbound 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth,  119th, Halsted and 115th  due to, street blockage near 111th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth,  119th, Halsted and 115th  due to, street blockage near 111th/Halsted.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier animal on the tracks at Rosemont. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier animal on the tracks at Rosemont. Service is resuming, allow extra time

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
